sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
belies another
, kaže, da je druga stvar zaradi prve videti zelo presenetljiva.

seg.quote: The young face belied the grey hair above it.

sense.def:
Lahko tudi rečemo, da neka stvar
belies another
, kadar prva stvar dokazuje, da druga ni pristna ali resnična.

seg.quote: Their social attitudes belie their words.
